pages.text: You are a partner of Mystia, you managed a restaurant with her. But you want to improve your cooking skill so you exit gensokyo.$(br)To get the approving to leave the gensokyo, you exchange some cooking memories with <that lady>
After you leave the gensokyo, Mystia and Patchouli give you this book that record the fantasy cuisines in the world$(br)Your journey begins, can you find your memory and make unbelievable cuisine?
